title: Runs list page with status filters
description: Wire up the runs list page with real data from the API. Add filtering by suite, status, and date range. Include pagination or infinite scroll for large datasets.
acceptance_criteria: Table showing all runs with pagination
Columns: suite, version, status, passed/total, avg score, trigger, timestamp
Filter dropdown: by status (all, pending, running, completed, failed)
Empty state if no runs match filters
implementation_notes: Use URL query params for filter state (?suite=x&status=y)
Sync filter state with URL for shareability
Consider server-side filtering if API supports it
Pagination: start with limit/offset, consider cursor-based later
